main event: A UFO was sighted 350 miles west of Los Angeles, California, exhibiting above average speed and altitude.
interesting points: The object accelerated away at a fantastic speed and exhibited no noise or exhaust trail., The object was reported to be very fast and bright., It disappeared quickly, preventing detailed observation., The sighting occurred early in the morning at 0622., The report indicates it was an unspecified aircraft.
sighted object: unusual object with above average speed
witness description: observer Major W. J. Adams, USAF
